title: SF’s party out of mini polls, JVP goes it alone
content: Source: The Island – by Dasun Edirisinghe (Pix by AP) Former Army Commander Sarath Fonseka’s faction of the Democratic National Alliance (DNA) will not contest the forthcoming local government elections. DNA President Tiran Alles MP told The Island yesterday that they would not contest the elections, but their ally, the JVP, would contest alone with…
